name: Pitch Deck (Gameheads)
description:
Pitch Deck is a super frantic first person game about reverting your corrupted coworkers back into humans with augmentation gauntlets with sick powers!

CONTROLS:

  • Move: WASD Keys / Left Stick
  • Look: Mouse / Right Stick
  • Jump: Space / A Button
  • Left Ability: Left Click / L2
  • Right Ability: Right Click / R2
  • Shuffle Left: Q / L1
  • Shuffle Right: E / R1
  • Block: Left Ctrl / RB

LIST OF KNOWN BUGS/PROBLEMS:

  • Health bar might not work sometimes/Player becomes invincible.
  • Currently no tutorial. (YOLOOOO).
  • A few more bugs that I haven't found yet (Still working on it) .

Software/Hardware Requirements:

  • A decent computer (One that won't lag).
  • Keyboard and mouse (Or controller).

#action #roguelike #other #shooter #rpg #arcade #adventure
